articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.title: Mystery solved: the viral 'glitch in the Matrix' iPhone wedding photo explained - TechRadar
articles.description: What caused this strange Instagram aberration?
articles.content: Ever since 'the dress' broke the internet and our brains in 2015 by appearing white-and-gold to some viewers, and black-and-blue to others, similar optical illusions have followed in its viral wake. … [+3135 chars]
